text: This was the evening of the last day of Gordon Way's "not you Susan, Secretary Susan at the office provided them -- poor, long-suffering Susan at the office, not you, of course."

passages.fragment: This was the evening of the last day of Gordon Way 's
passages.full_quote: <used>This was the evening of the last day of Gordon Way's</used> life, and he was wondering if the rain would hold off for the weekend

passages.fragment: of Gordon Way 's `` not you Susan , Secretary Susan at the office
passages.full_quote: It inserts a bit <used>of Gordon Way's "not you Susan, Secretary Susan at the office</used>" doubletalk into a sentence from Mostly Harmless

passages.fragment: Susan at the office provided them -- poor , long-suffering Susan at the office
passages.full_quote: <used>Susan at the office provided them -- poor, long-suffering Susan at the office</used>

passages.fragment: Susan at the office , not you , of course
passages.full_quote: "<used>Susan at the office, not you, of course</used>," continued Gordon's voice on the answering machine
